mapper.select: select hs.no, hs.houseinfo_no, hi.aptName, hs.sale_amount, hs.sale_type_code, hs.description, hs.room, hs.floor, hi.lat, hi.lng from housesale hs, houseinfo hi where hs.houseinfo_no = hi.no order by hi.AptName asc;

select no, dong_code, post_date, sale_amount, move_in_code, move_in_date, sale_type_code, description, room, bathroom, floor, houseinfo_no, user_email from my_house.housesale where user_email = #{userEmail}

select s.no, s.dong_code, s.post_date, s.sale_amount, s.move_in_code, s.move_in_date, s.sale_type_code, s.description, s.room, s.bathroom, s.floor, s.user_email , s.address_detail, s.utility_bill, s.parking, s.direction, i.dong, i.AptName, i.buildYear, i.jibun from housesale s join houseinfo i where s.houseinfo_no = i.no
mapper.update: update housesale set address_detail = #{addressDetail}, sale_amount = #{saleAmount}, sale_type_code = #{saleTypeCode}, description = #{description}, where no = #{no} and user_email = #{userEmail}
mapper.insert:
insert into houseinfo (dong, AptName, code, jibun, lat, lng) values (#{dong}, #{AptName}, #{code}, #{jibun}, #{lat}, #{lng} )
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
